text:
My friend Anna got
addicted to opioids,

and became dependent
on financial support
from her family.

To prove she was sober,
she had to do urine tests

in the bathroom
with the door open,
and her dad standing outside.

There has to be a better
way to support recovery.

That's why I started
DynamiCare Health

with my dad, a national expert
in addiction psychiatry.

DynamiCare is based
on science showing

that combining
frequent monitoring

with immediate incentives is the
most effective evidence based

and overlooked
intervention for addiction.

In under two years
we've signed a contract

with a major
national health plan,

and helped patients with
drug, alcohol, and tobacco
addictions.
So here's how it works.

Our first killer
feature is random drug
testing through the phone.

Patients get a text asking them
to do a breathalyzer or saliva

test over a selfie
video of themselves.
No more degrading urine tests.

Patients earn rewards
on a debit card

that blocks access to bars,
liquor stores, and cash
withdrawals.

DynamiCare, the digital platform
for monitoring and rewards

will revolutionize how
we support recovery.
Thank you.
[APPLAUSE]
